author: kyrers
content:
Q: Can my validator be activated if offline? I realize after activation I can't shut it down.
I'm asking because I'm using my personal laptop for the test and need to switch OS to do some other work ðŸ˜¦
After tomorrow, I'll leave it running until after the merge.

author: seamonkey82
content: Once your deposit has been made, your validator enters the activation queue and will be activated regardless of whether or not you have it online.

author: kyrers
content: So it's fine if I just get it running tomorrow, even though I already made the deposit?

author: seamonkey82
content: Yes.  Your validator will just incur inactivity penalties while it is offline.
